about_the_game:
The Expert Vehicles Pack contains three models with very different characteristics for dealing with rocks, mud and the harshest environments.
- The Polaris RZR XP 1000 Trails & Rocks
- The Arctic Cat Alterra MudPro 700 LTD
- The Zordix Rock Crawler
detailed_description:
The Expert Vehicles Pack contains three models with very different characteristics for dealing with rocks, mud and the harshest environments.
- The Polaris RZR XP 1000 Trails & Rocks
- The Arctic Cat Alterra MudPro 700 LTD
- The Zordix Rock Crawler
legal_notice: Overpass™ ©2019 Bigben Interactive. Published by Bigben Interactive. Developed by Zordix. All rights reserved.
name: OVERPASS™ Expert Vehicles Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-3470/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Expert Vehicles Pack contains three models with very different characteristics for dealing with rocks, mud and the harshest environments. - The Polaris RZR XP 1000 Trails & Rocks - The Arctic Cat Alterra MudPro 700 LTD - The Zordix Rock Crawler
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
